item.title: DJ NOISE P'S TRIBUTE TO MICHAEL JACKSON - R.I.P The King For Ever
item.description: I started this episode about 4 years ago ... And I took my time to do it ... "Why?" I hear you think ! Simple : I respect(ed) MJ and his music so much that I wanted it to be perfect or at least as close as possible to perfection ... So every time I got a rush of inspiration I worked on what now became my Tribute to the King of Pop ... I hope it makes you feel the way it makes me feel ... Like MJ never parted ... May his soul rest in peace... One love Noise P
item.dc:creator: DJ NOISE P
item.itunes:summary:
I started this episode about 4 years ago ... And I took my time to do it ... "Why?" I hear you think ! Simple : I respect(ed) MJ and his music so much that I wanted it to be perfect or at least as close as possible to perfection ... So every time I got a rush of inspiration I worked on what now became my Tribute to the King of Pop ... I hope it makes you feel the way it makes me feel ... Like MJ never parted ... May his soul rest in peace...
One love Noise P

item.title: DJ NOISE P'S TRIBUTE TO MICHAEL JACKSON Vol. 2
item.description: legend lives on … It's been 2 years and 9 months , 2 years and 9 months since the King Of Pop past away and left us for a better world. 2 years ago I shared with you my passion for MJ's music. this is The volume 2, to keep MJ alive amonst us ! So enjoy this mix and don't stop 'til you get enough ... One Love; Noise P
item.dc:creator: DJ NOISE P

item.title: NOTORIOUS B.I.G vs 2 PAC
item.description: I Did It On Thursday, October 30, 2008 I dedicate this episode in loving memory of the two biggest rappers ever -in my eyes- I'm a DJ and love Hip Hop Culture but I do not give a f*ck about West Coast - East Coast wars … What matters is the love for Hip Hop Because One Rap, One Love … Remember that ! I would have loved to put more songs as they are music magicians but I had to keep some in store for the "next episode" … So now : Enjoy my Legends … 1. N PHAT FLAVOR iNTRO 2. 2 Pac "Dear Mama" 3. 2 Pac "Keep Ya Head Up" 4. Notorious BIG - P Mix Interlude 5. Notorious BIG "Kick In The Door" 6. Notorious BIG "Sky The Limit " 7. 2 Pac "Thugz Mansion " 8. 2 Pac "Me Against The World " 9. Notorious BIG Feat. Junior M.A.F.I.A " Get Money" 10. Notorious BIG Feat. Junior M.A.F.I.A. "Gettin' Money" - Remix 11. 2 Pac Feat. Outlawz "Hit' Em Up" 12. 2 Pac "All Ayez On Me" 13. Notorious BIG "What's The 411 - R'n'B Bitches" 14. Notorious BIG "One More Chance" - Ready To Die 15. Notorious BIG "Hypnotized" 16. 2 Pac Feat. Dr DRE - Interlude "California Vs Av8" 17. 2 Pac Feat. Dr DRE "California Love " - Remix 18. 2 Pac "Nigga's Nature" 19. 2 Pac "I get Around" 20. 2 Pac "Just Like Daddy" 21. Notorious BIG "Big Poppa" 22. Notorious BIG "One More Chance" 23. Notorious BIG " I Got a Story To Tell" 24. 2 Pac "Ain't Mad Cha" 25. 2 Pac " Krazy" 26. 2 Pac " Do For Love" 27. 2 Pac Feat. Snoop Dogg " 2 Of Amerikaz Most Wanted" 28. Notorious BIG "Going Back To Cali" 29. Notorious BIG "Nasty Boy" 30. Notorious BIG "Notorious" 31. 2 Pac Feat. Left Eye "Letter To My Unborn" 32. 2 Pac Feat. Kc & Jojo "How Do You Want It" 33. 2 Pac & Notorious BIG "Runnin" (Dying To Live) 34. N Phat Outro
item.dc:creator: DJ NOISE P
item.itunes:summary:
I Did It On Thursday, October 30, 2008
I dedicate this episode in loving memory of the two biggest rappers ever -in my eyes- I'm a DJ and love Hip Hop Culture but I do not give a f*ck about West Coast - East Coast wars … What matters is the love for Hip Hop Because One Rap, One Love … Remember that ! I would have loved to put more songs as they are music magicians but I had to keep some in store for the "next episode" … So now : Enjoy my Legends …

item.title: I FUNK YOU Vol 1
item.description: let's groove tonight and share the spice of life ! P 1. Intro "DJ NOISE P" 2. Aretha Franklin "Jump To It" 3. Al Jarreau "Boogie Down" 4. BB & Q Band "On The Shelf" 5. Georges Benson "Give Me The Night" 6. Kool And The Gang "Get Down On It" 7. Kool And The Gang "She's Fresh" (Remix) 8. Indeep "Last Night A Dj Saved My Life" 9. Midnight Star "Mindes Touch" 10. Chic "Le Freak" 11. The Whispers "And The Beat Goes On" 12. Sister Sledge "He's The Greatest Dancer" 13. Sister Sledge "We are Family" 14. Sister Sledge "Good Times" 15. Billy Ocean "Get Out Of My Dreams, Get Into My car" (Remix) 16. Anita Ward "Ring My Bell" 17. Rick James "Superfreak" 18. The Brothers Johnson "Stomp" 19. The Emotions "Best Of My Love" ( Remix) 20. Luther Vandross "Shine" 21. Angela Winbush "I Love You More" 22. Diana Ross "Upside Down" (Remix) 23. Barry White - Megamix -" Let's The Music Play", -"Can't Get Enough Of Your Love Baby",... 24. Jocelyn Brown "Somebody Else Guy" 25. Outro "N Phat Flavor Radio"

item.title: 2009 DJ NOISE P FLAVORS CHAP 18 PROMO MIX
item.description: 1. N PHAT RADIO INTRO By NOISE P 2. FLY GYPSY "2 Step" 3. DRAKE Feat.GUCCI MANE "Believe It Or Not" 4. LUDACRIS Feat.SHAWANA "How Low" 5. T.A. CORLEONE "My Blackberry" 6. 2 PISTOLS "Swag 4 Sale" 7. BIG UNK aka Mr.Real ESTATE "Johnny Bravo" 8. CATSKILL "Dub CNN" 9. JANET JACKSON "Luv" 10. TIMBALAND feat.DRAKE "Say Something" 11. JAY Z Feat.PHARRELL WILLIAMS "So Ambitious"-P Mix 12. THE GAME Feat.GUCCI MANE "Krazy" 13. 50 CENT "Crime Wave" 14. JUELZ SANTANA & THE DREAM "Hit It On The Road"-Remix 15. GUCCI MANE Feat.MARIO "Break Up" By DJ TEDSMOOTH 16. JOVI ROCKWELL "Killin Dem" 17. RAKIM Feat. MAINO & TRACEY HORTON "Walk These Streets" 18. THE GAME "Big Money" 19. 50 CENT "So Disrespectful" 20. WALE Feat.PHARRELL WILLIAMS "Inhibitions" 21. TIMBALAND Feat.MISSY ELLIOT & T=PAIN "Talk That Shit" 22. JENNIFER Feat.LOPEZ "Fresh Out The Oven" 23. KAZ-KASTRO "I Am Him" (ExclusivVVVVVVVVV) 24. SNOOP DOGG "World Of A Gansta" 25. Noise P INTERLUDE "Ten Crak Commandement" 26. 50 CENT Feat.NEYO & NOTORIOUS B.I.G "Baby By Me"-DJay 360 Remix 27. DIDDY-DIRTY MONEY & RED CAFE "Love Come Down"-Remix 28. JAHEIM "Ain't Leavin You" 29. Noise P INTERLUDE "Ring Ring Ring" 30. TIMBALAND Feat.KERI HILSON & JAY-Z "Rumors" 31. N PHAT FLAVOR RADIO Outro

item.title: MY RADIO FLAVOR 4
item.description: As you requested :) My BIRTHDAY GIFT HTTP://NPHATFLAVOR.PODOMATIC.COM 1. N PHAT & Noise P INTRO 2. Kriss Kross "Tonights The Night" 3. Krs One "Mcs Act Like They Know" 4. Mona Lisa Feat. Lost Boyz "Can't Be Wasting My Time" 5. Men Of Vizion Feat. Lost Boyz "Do You Feel Me...Freak You" 6. Brownstone "If You Love Me" 7. ZhanÈ Feat. Busta Rhymes "It's A Party" 8. Foxy Brown Feat. Black Street "Get Me Home" 9. Foxy Brown Feat. Method Man "Ill Na Na" 10. Big Pun Faet. Fat Joe & Joe "Still Not A Player" - Remix 11. Bahamadia "U Know How We Do" 12. Mc Lyte & Xcape "Keep On, Keepin On" 13. Michael Jackson "Liberian Girl" 14. Brandy " Baby" 15. Warren G Feat. Adina Howard " What's Love Got To Do With It" 16. X Zibit "Papparazzi" 17. Dj Jazzy Jeff & The Fresh Prince "Summer Time" - Remix 18. Kool G Rap Feat. G Wise "My Life" 19. Paid & Full Feat. Lauryn Hill "All My Time" 20. Queen Latifah "U.N.I.T.Y." 21. Ice Cube "It Was A Good Day" 22. M.O.P. "Cold As Ice" 23. N Phat Flavor Radio With Dj Noise P
